duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide virtual coaching and mentoring in nutrition, dietetics, and healthy lifestyle management to clients.
Manage and mentor clients on business aspects of health coaching and building an online community.
Use marketing strategies to attract clients and build a large online community of health-oriented individuals.
Use Zoom platform to conduct virtual coaching sessions and interactions with clients.
Focus on results-driven approach to create measurable long-term results in weight loss and overall health improvement.

education_certification.credential: Certification in Nutrition and Dietetics, Health Coaching, or related field (Bachelor's degree preferred)
